text: Sum tame te'one nathi joya je'one adesa apavamam avyo hato ke potana hathone roki rakho ane namajha padhata raho ane jhakata apata raho, pachi jyare te'one jehadano adesa apavamam avyo to te ja samaye te'onum eka jutha lokothi evi rite darava lagyum jevum ke allaha ta'alathi darata hoya, parantu tena karata pana vadhare ane kaheva lagya, he amara palanahara! Tem amara para jehada kema pharajiyata kari didhum? Kema amane thodunka jivana vadhare na apyum? Tame kahi do ke duniyano sodo ghano ja ocho che ane daravavala'o mate to akherata ja uttama che ane tamara para eka dora barabara pana atyacara karavamam nahim ave
